column5: Private room with full bed and share bath in beautiful home located at the heart of Clear Lake City, where Space Center Houston and Johnson Space Center resides. The house is 20 minutes from downtown Houston, near the relaxing water of Galveston Bay. This thriving community offers many amenities for business, families: fishing, boating, recreations: annual ballunar liftoff festival, Kemah boardwalk, Space Center of Houston, Armand Bayou wild life park.
column8: Private room in Clear Lake with Full Size bed
